overview: The subject of the film: translating without words, through a filmic writing, the inner wandering of a moving thought, in its discontinuity, its jumps, its eclipses, with its accelerations, ruptures, stops, drifts, falls, erasures ...  "Housing project by a single man", corresponding to the film being made. The man perceived as double: in constant relation with his "other", this man is the subject of the film.
title: La Déambulation
